title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1085/94 of 10 May 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for peaches including nectarines
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1085/94 of 10 May 1994 fixing for the 1994 marketing year the reference prices for peaches including nectarines
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1994 marketing year, the reference prices for peaches including nectarines, falling within CN code 0809 30 00, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
June (11 to 20): 82,44,
(21 to 30): 71,65,
July: 71,22,
August: 56,98,
September: 56,23.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 June 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
